items.title: Our Favorite Smart Lock for Your Front Door Is Just $164 Right Now
items.description: The Yale Approach Lock is easy to install, offers auto-unlock, and is 32% off right now.

items.title: Stripe enlists a who’s who, including Anthropic, OpenAI, and Paradigm, to build a new blockchain
items.description: Stripe is funding a new blockchain called Tempo to process stablecoins faster. And many big names are joining the effort.

items.title: Mark Zuckerberg sues Mark Zuckerberg
items.description: Mark S. Zuckerberg, an attorney, says that he's losing business because his Facebook business profile keeps getting disabled.

items.title: TED leader’s $300M ‘valley of death’ fund might be just what later-stage climate tech needs
items.description: The new fund hopes to send a "Seqouia-like" signal to other investors that there are promising later-stage climate tech startups waiting to be funded.
